featured.text: Fifty years ago, teams of architects began restoring the historic treasures of the city.
In Barcelona, however, the birds are now threatening to 17 the city’s historic center, pooping on monuments, buildings, and even tourists.
In fact, a visit to a major European city just would not be the same 16 encountering them: bathing in fountains, perching on historic buildings, and flocking in public squares.

definition.zh_def: 具有重要歷史意義的，或與歷史有關的。
definition.en_def: Having significance in history or being related to history.
definition.example: The signing of the Declaration of Independence was a historic event.
